candidates.noResultsText: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria to find what you're looking for.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about the Digital Diwan platform and our mission.
about.missionText: Our mission is to foster a safe, engaging, and inclusive space for Iraqis to discuss politics, share concerns, and hold leaders accountable. We aim to make democracy accessible for a new generation through a modern social media experience.
about.feature1: Candidate Profiles: Detailed information about each candidate.
about.feature2: Social Feed: A dynamic feed for posts, discussions, and updates.
about.feature3: Community Moderation: Tools for the community to maintain a healthy dialogue.
about.feature4: Multilingual Support: Available in Arabic, Kurdish, and English.
about.commitmentText: We are committed to neutrality, transparency, and empowering the Iraqi people with the information they need to make informed decisions during the election cycle.
